revision.text: '''Qualot''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 10, but no more than 15 points of spicy, sweet and sour and 0 points of all other flavours. The [[Cheri]], [[Pecha]] and [[Aspear]] berries must be unlocked to obtain this berry.
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
